channel.title: Science on Tim Stuart
channel.description: Recent content in Science on Tim Stuart

item.title: Bioinformatics snippets
item.description: Trim reads cutadapt -a AGATCGGAAGAGCACACGTCTGAACTCCAGTCAC -o output.fq.gz input.fq.gz Map RNA-seq # build index STAR --runThreadN 10 \ --runMode genomeGenerate \ --genomeDir genome \ --genomeFastaFiles genome.fa \ --sjdbGTFfile genes.gtf # map STAR --runThreadN 20 \ --genomeDir genome \ --alignIntronMax 5000 \ --alignIntronMin 10 \ --readFilesCommand zcat \ --readFilesIn input.fq.gz Pseudomap RNA-seq with kallisto # build index kallisto index -i index.idx Arabidopsis_thaliana.TAIR10.cds.all.fa #quantify for filename in *.fq.gz; do samplename=(${filename//.fq.gz/ }) kallisto quant -i index.
